snippet: Americans will have to wait a bit longer to find out who will be the first woman on their paper currency in more than a century.
abstract: Treasury Sec Jacob J Lew says he will not announce the woman who will be on $10 bill to replace Alexander Hamilton until 2016.
lead_paragraph: Americans will have to wait a bit longer to find out who will be the first woman on their paper currency in more than a century.

headline.main: Word on Woman Who Will Be on $10 Bill Is Delayed
headline.print_headline: Word on Woman Who Will Be on $10 Bill Is Delayed
